name: Tile Dasher
description:
Tile Dasher - Dash through a 50x50 terrain, populated with falling tiles, coins and power ups. How many tiles can you dash over before falling into the void?

-Features

- Play Tile Dasher and run over as many tiles as you can

- Tiles will fall so be careful

- Swipe or tap to move left or right

- Collect coins to purchase skins

- Gather power-ups to assist in achieving a high score

- Blue tiles grant a temporary speed boost

- Purple tiles grant temporary immunity to gravity

- Yellow tiles equip you with a magnet that lasts for the rest of the round

- No in-app purchases
